articles.title: Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Leaves for Nicaragua
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Leaves for Nicaragua
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, left here Friday to take part in the inaugural ceremony of the president of the Republic of Nicaragua as special envoy of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission.
					 He was seen off by Ri Su Yong, member of the DPRK State Affairs Commission, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex which launched a new year campaign of innovation in production.
					 Going round various production processes of the complex, he learned about the production of heavy rails to be sent to the Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway construction site and gave pep-talks to its workers bringing about production surge.
					
					 Then followed a consultative meeting, which stressed the importance of the complex's duty in sprucing up Samjiyon County and discussed the matters for party and working people's organizations to make effort to speed up the production of heavy rails.

articles.title: Letter to UN Secretary-General by DPRK Permanent Representative
articles.content:
Letter to UN Secretary-General by DPRK Permanent Representative
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative to the United Nations sent a letter to the UN secretary-general on Thursday to make clear viewpoints regarding the letter addressed by the under secretary-general for Political Affairs, on behalf of the former UN secretary-general.
					The letter said:
					
					I want to begin with the conclusion that the letter addressed by the under secretary-general for Political Affairs is not the answer to my question on what is the legal ground for the UN Security Council "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK over its nuclear tests and peaceful satellite launch.
					
					In the letters to the former UN secretary-general dated May 23 and December 5, 2016 respectively, I questioned if there is any single article in international laws which stipulates that nuclear tests and satellite and ballistic rocket launches constitute a threat to international peace and security as a legal ground for the UNSC "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK.
					
					However, the UN Secretariat has only mentioned Article 39 in the UN Charter without any single word in response to my questions.
					
					Article 39 of the UN Charter cannot be a legal ground for "sanctions resolutions" as was already discussed in international law community.
					
					In 1966 when former Rhodesia declared independence from the British colonial regime the UNSC adopted a sanction resolution invoking Article 39 as its legal ground for the first time in the history of the UN. In this regard the international law community asserted that declaration of independence is not a threat to the peace or breach of the peace and labeled the adoption of the sanction resolution as an act of abuse of power. And even the writers of the UN Charter clarified that they had drafted Article 39 referring to an act of aggression, not to be invoked for a sanction in a peaceful time.
					
					If any nuclear test or satellite or ballistic rocket launch were considered a "threat to international peace and security", the UNSC should have made an issue of and enforced sanctions on the United States and other countries regarding their nuclear tests of over 2 000 times, ongoing regular satellite and ballistic rocket launches.
					
					This clearly proves that Article 39 of the UN Charter has no relation with any of nuclear tests or satellite launches.
					
					The acts of fabricating an unlawful and immoral "sanction resolution", imposing sanctions of blockade and going as far as to include in the list of targets of sanctions even sports rifles or bullets and bows and arrows by the UNSC are nothing but an act against humanity and civilization, severely threatening the right to live of our people and destroying the modern civilization as well as making the whole world turn back to the medieval dark land.
					
					The hydrogen bomb test, nuclear warhead test and test-firing of various means of strike including inter-continental ballistic rockets are all full exercise of the legitimate right as stipulated in the UN Charter, as self-defensive measures for deterrent power which can wipe out the source of provocation in case of the encroachment upon our sovereignty and right to existence by the hostile forces.
					
					As long as the United States and its followers keep on nuclear threats and blackmails and as long as they do not stop their war games at our doorstep, disguising them as annual events, our self-defensive capabilities and the capability for preemptive strike with the nuclear armed forces as their pivot will be bolstered significantly.
					
					I hope that the UN Secretariat will discharge its responsibility before the international community by pondering over the questions regarding a legal ground of the "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK and by responding with impartial answers to them in conformity with the basic mission of the UN for international peace and security.

articles.title: Officials Take Part in First Friday Labor for This Year
articles.content:
Officials Take Part in First Friday Labor for This Year
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Officials of ministries and national institutions in the DPRK took part in the first Friday labor for this year at farms in Pyongyang.
					 With trucks loaded with farm materials and quality compost, they left Kim Il Sung Square for Wollo Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District and Ryuhyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryokpho District, the bases for supplying vegetables to the capital city, and the farm of animal feed.
					
					 At those farms they did farm work together with agricultural workers.

articles.title: Children's New Year Performance Goes on
articles.content:
Children's New Year Performance Goes on
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The children's New Year performance "12 Months of the Country of the Sun" in celebration of Juche 106 (2017) is going on at Mangyongdae School Children's Palace.
					 Among the audience were working people of different strata, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreign guests in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performance started with song and dance "We Offer New Year's Greetings to Respected Marshal Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Its numbers included song of triplets "Generalissimo is Our Sun", male solo "It's like Riding Mallima" and light music "Beat Drum for Battle".
					
					 The performers showed the looks of happy schoolchildren in the country upholding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as their eternal sun and enjoying happiness under the care of the Worker's Party of Korea.
					
					 There were also programs praising Kim Jong Un who shows all kinds of love for the children with the same affection as was shown by the great leaders.
					
					 The performers well represented the schoolchildren's pride of growing up to be the masters of a scientific and technological power outpacing the world and young revolutionaries and guards inheriting the lifeblood of the revolution.

articles.title: Young People of DPRK Filled with Will to Work New Miracles
articles.content:
Young People of DPRK Filled with Will to Work New Miracles
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The young people in the DPRK are now filled with strong will to create fresh legendary tales about heroic youth this year, a year of key importance in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 From the beginning of the year, they are working admirable feats under the slogan "Let Us Accelerate the Victorious Advance of Socialism with the Great Spirit of Self-reliance and Self-development as the Dynamic Force!"
					
					 The youth shock brigade movement and other mass movements are vigorously conducted and innovation effected wherever the young people are.
					
					 Cherishing in mind that the strength of self-reliance and self-development is based on science and technology, young scientists and technicians across the country are taking the lead in solving sci-tech problems arising in updating industrial establishments and putting their production on a normal footing with the main emphasis on ensuring the domestic production of raw materials, fuel and equipment.
					
					 The working youths in leading economic sectors have turned out in a drive for increased production, over-fulfilling their first day's production assignments of the year.
					
					 Similar progress is made by young people engaged in light industry, agriculture and fishery.
					
					 The revolutionary zeal and working spirit of young Koreans can be also felt at major project construction sites, including Samjiyon County to be spruced up as a model county of the country.

articles.title: Youths and Women Vow to Carry through Tasks Set Forth in Supreme Leader's New Year Address
articles.content:
Youths and Women Vow to Carry through Tasks Set Forth in Supreme Leader's New Year Address
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the young vanguard and officials and members of the women's union met at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre and the Hall of Women Friday to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials of relevant fields, the youth league and the women's union, youths and students and members of the union.
					
					 Reports were delivered at the meetings to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as the banner instilling faith and courage into the army and people out in the new year campaign and the guidelines for glorifying this year with national events and miracles.
					
					 They stressed the need to fully display the mettle and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's youth vanguard in an all-out general offensive to attain the goals of the 5-year strategy for national economic development in hearty response to the Supreme Leader's New Year Address.
					
					 They called for turning out as one in the new year advance for carrying out the tasks set forth by the Supreme Leader in his New Year Address and thus achieving greater victory and turning the heyday of the revolution into the great era of prosperity.
					
					 They underscored the need to fully demonstrate the militant power and might in the struggle to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea this year, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Provincial Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Provincial Mass Rallies Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in North and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces on Friday to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power, economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, workers and youths.
					
					 Reports were made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that the officials, party members and working people out in the new year general onward advance are burning their hearts with pledge of loyalty to achieve greater victory under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They referred to successes made by the officials, party members and working people in the struggle for implementing the decision of the 7th WPK Congress last year.
					
					 They stressed the need for all officials, party members and working people to turn out as one in the worthwhile struggle to certainly attain the  militant goals for this year, a year of important significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 They called for regarding Kim Jong Un's New Year Address as the motto of their life and struggle and become the creator of heroic feats and miracles in the all-out general advance for glorifying this significant year with great victory.
					
					 There took place mass demonstrations.
					
					 The participants in the demonstrations marched through squares and streets, chanting revolutionary and militant slogans.

articles.title: DPRK People Intensify Study of Supreme Leader's New Year Address
articles.content:
Korean People Make Deep Study of Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now making deep study of the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. They started the march for making remarkable progress in the implementation of the decisions adopted at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Newspapers, TV and broadcasting services edit the system and contents of the New Year Address, helping the people in their study.
					
					 Seen in the streets and public places are announcers explaining the contents of the address.
					
					 Ministries, national institutions, factories, enterprises and co-op farms across the country imbue the working people with the idea and spirit of the address through question-and-answer contests.
					
					 The Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and the Ministry of Machine-building Industry set up visual aids in different places.
					
					 Officials of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex and the Chonsam Co-op Farm in Anbyon County, Kangwon Province arouse the working people to a drive for surpassing the peak-year level, while explaining the system and contents of the address on the spots.
					
					 Such atmosphere of studying the New Year Address greatly encourages the Korean people in their general offensive for attaining the goals of the 5-year strategy for national economic development, under the militant slogan "Let Us Accelerate the Victorious Advance of Socialism with the Great Spirit of Self-reliance and Self-development as the Dynamic Force!"

articles.title: Field Medical Service Activities Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Medical Service Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that he is hardening his resolve to seek more tasks for the sake of the people.
					 Much moved by his ardent call, medical workers across the country are conducting field medical service from the outset of the year.
					
					 Medical workers of the Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University and the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital carry on preventive and curative medical care for workers of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, encouraging them to make innovations in production of electricity.
					
					 Medical workers of the General Dental Hospital under the Ministry of Public Health, Kim Man Yu Hospital and the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital launch their medical service at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant and Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang to inspire them to the implementation of the tasks set forth in the New Year Address.
					
					 Medical workers of the Ministry of Public Health Skin-disease Preventive Centre and Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital Nos. 1, 2, and 3 also conduct medical checkup and treatment at major industrial establishments in different sectors of the national economy.
					
					 Meanwhile, medical workers of the South Hamgyong, Jagang and other provincial people's hospitals conduct brisk healthcare service at the February 8 Vinalon Complex, Hungnam Fertilizer Complex, Kanggye Unha Garment Factory and other industrial establishments.

articles.title: Tenet of DPRK's Consistent Foreign Policy
articles.content:
Tenet of DPRK's Consistent Foreign Policy
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The Party and government of the DPRK are making positive efforts to usher in a new chapter of developing the foreign relations in line with its changed international position.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un clarified in his New Year Address that the Party and government of the DPRK would remain committed to the ideals of their foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship, expand and develop the relations of good-neighbourliness, friendship and cooperation with those countries championing independence, and make concerted efforts with them to ensure genuine international justice.
					
					 The ideals of the DPRK's foreign policy clarified by him serve as important guidelines giving clear answers to the principled matters of boosting its external relations on its own initiative and ensuring the dignity and interests of the nation at the highest level in line with its status of independent power and a nuclear power.
					
					 The DPRK's strategic position has reached the highest level since its founding.
					
					 An epochal turn was brought about in bolstering up the defence capability of the DPRK and it achieved the status of a nuclear power, a military giant in the East which no enemy, however formidable, can dare to provoke. This provided a guarantee for defending the destiny of the country and nation and playing a leading role in building a just and peaceful, new world.
					
					 Independence is the main principle being maintained by the government of the DPRK in its external relations.
					
					 There are big and small countries in the world. But there can be no superior and inferior countries or those dictating others and those obliged to get instructions. Every country and nation is equal and should exercise same sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK, by strictly adhering to the principle of independence in its external relations, could invariably and dynamically advance along the road chosen by it, despite the raging wind raised by the reactionary forces of history against socialism worldwide and the hegemonic powers' evermore undisguised high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The DPRK is working hard to defend peace and stability of mankind.
					
					 The desire of humankind for peace has not yet come true in the new century owing to the forces seeking aggression and war against peace.
					
					 The imperialists including the U.S. are still clinging to the war policy while dreaming of dominating the world with strength and harassing peace wherever they go.
					
					 Today when those imperialists are getting evermore undisguised in their war moves, the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence serves as a powerful weapon for defending peace.
					
					 If the ideal and desire of humankind to live independently and peacefully are to come true, every country should unite close under the banner of friendship.
					
					 Now that the imperialists are further tightening the nexus for aggression to keep their supremacy, the anti-imperialist independent countries should counter the imperialist and reactionary forces' offensive with their strategy of unity.
					
					 The DPRK government has made positive efforts to establish and develop the relations of friendship with the countries which are friendly towards it, guided by the ideal of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 It is the consistent foreign policy stand of the DPRK to improve and normalize the relations with those countries which respect its sovereignty and are friendly toward it though they had been hostile to it in the past.
					
					 The DPRK will invariably adhere to the tenet of its foreign policy-- independence, peace and friendship-- and make positive contributions to the independent development of the world in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Indicates Starting-Point for Peace and Reunification: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Guidelines for Peace and Reunification of Korea
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The entire Korean nation is pervaded with joy and confidence in peace and reunification this year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address made a perfect clarification of the matter of improving the inter-Korean relations and making a starting-point for peace and reunification.
					
					 The improvement of the north-south relations is the starting-point for peace and reunification and it is an urgent requirement of the whole nation.
					
					 The Koreans are a homogeneous nation that has created brilliant history and culture on the same land for five thousand years.
					
					 There are differing ideologies and social systems in the north and the south of Korea at present but they cannot be reason or conditions for them to stand in confrontation and antagonize each other.
					
					 Division is harmful to the Korean nation and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations is vital as it is related to its destiny.
					
					 The perpetuation of the country's division would only increase the pain and disaster of the compatriots and the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula. In that case they will be unable to escape the national disaster.
					
					 This is proved by the serious consequences brought to the south Korean people last year by the total shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Park, the last symbol of the north-south cooperation, and the moves for the deployment of THAAD, etc.
					
					 Under the present situation where international order based on the jungle law prevails in the international arena and each country and nation prioritizes its own interests, if a nation goes united, it gets stronger but it is bound to go to ruin when divided. This is a reality today.
					
					 For the north and the south of Korea to remain at odds with each other and stand in confrontation is nothing but an act of going to self-destruction as it hinders the uniform development of the nation and helps outsiders fish in troubled waters.
					
					 Whoever is desirous of durable peace and prosperity common to the nation should unite close and overcome all sorts of misunderstanding, distrust and conflict and develop the north-south relations into the relationship of trust and reconciliation.
					
					 Any politician, if he or she remains a passive onlooker to the current deadlock between the two sides, can neither claim to be fully discharging his or her responsibility and role for the nation nor enjoy public support.
					
					 All compatriots want peace, reconciliation, unity and reunification, not war.
					
					 It is impossible to defuse acute military clash and danger of war unless the inter-Korean ties are mended.
					
					 Every manner of abuses and slanders aimed at offending the other party and inciting confrontation can not be justified on any account, and an immediate stop should be put to the malicious smear campaign and other acts of hostility towards the DPRK, all designed for the overthrow of its system and any other "change."
					
					 Korea will become a reunified power and there is nothing to fear and nothing impossible if the north and the south pool their will and efforts.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north, the south and abroad should regard the idea of improving the inter-Korean relations, starting-point for peace and reunification and demand of the times, as a noble guideline and make this year a meaningful year of a new phase in independent reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Purpose of Abe's Trip to Pearl Harbor
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Purpose of Abe's Trip to Pearl Harbor
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries a commentator's article disclosing the purpose of Abe's visit to Pearl Harbor.
					 Abe paid the first visit to Pearl Harbor in Hawaii of the U.S. from December 26 to 27 last year as the incumbent prime minister of Japan in its history.
					
					 During his junket Abe paid "floral tribute" at the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific or "Punchbowl" and the USS Arizona Monument in Honolulu City in Hawaii. He held "summit talks" and a joint press conference and released a "statement" in which he honored the memory of the American victims and expressed "hope that Pearl Harbor would be remembered as a symbol of reconciliation." 
					
					 Abe also uttered that he felt calmly proud of Japan's going for peace for over seven decades after the war, expressing resolve to "make sure the horrors of war are not repeated."
					
					 At the talks with Obama, Abe stressed the need to expand the scope of Japan-U.S. alliance for peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region and further strengthen the tri-angular military alliance with the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 He let out a flurry of rhetoric touring here and there but the summary of what he uttered was just a formal gesture of honoring the memory of those killed without making any apology and reflection on the past crimes, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Abe's visit to Pearl Harbor was an action taken by him to take revenge on Obama for the disgrace and insult the former suffered in Hiroshima last year.
					
					 And it was, at the same time, a mendicant trip to prevent the Japan-U.S. alliance from rapidly shaking owing to the expected inauguration of the new master of the White House and a hypocritical tour by the boss of the Japanese militarists aiming at realizing the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" under the spurious signboard of "peace." 
					
					 No matter what ulterior purposes Abe may pursue in clinging to the U.S., they will get him nowhere.
					
					 The best way for Japan to escape its ruin is to make a sincere apology for its past crimes, pay adequate reparation for them and definitely give up its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 The bellicose moves of Abe to realize the scenario for staging a comeback to Korea and the rest of Asia, backed by the U.S. will only result in bringing the archipelago of Japan to the bottom of the sea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Kick up Confrontation Rackets
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Kick up Confrontation Rackets
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are getting hell-bent on the war moves to stoke atmosphere of confrontation with fellow countrymen from the outset of the year, according to reports from south Korea.
					 On the New Year's Day the puppet defense minister of south Korea stressed the need for the south Korean army "not to waver but to watch the enemy only," vociferating about the "north's provocative threat."
					
					 The chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff examined the combat readiness of soldiers, flying an AWAC over the five islands in the biggest hotspot in the West Sea of Korea, the Thaean peninsula and the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean army corps conducted live-shell firing in six areas.
					
					 The chief of air staff conducted commanding flight on a fighter on Jan. 2 in the air above the East Sea to let fighters make sorties for tactical interception duty.
					
					 Warships of the puppet Navy were busy with naval maneuvers including live-shell firing drill in the seas. While commanding the maneuvers, the chief of naval staff cried out for "watching the frontline only."

articles.title: Ouster of Park Geun Hye and Halt to THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ouster of Park Geun Hye and Halt to THAAD Deployment Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- An emergency rally for ouster of Park Geun Hye and withdrawal of projected THAAD deployment was held in Seoul of south Korea on Dec. 31 last year under the co-sponsorship of the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and other organizations, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 At the rally, speakers disclosed the fact that complaint against the president of the Lotte group was dismissed and handled with non-restraint decision and then, the site for THAAD deployment was decided.
					
					 They urged politicians to clarify at once the stand for total withdrawal of the projected THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russia's Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russia's Website
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Russia's website Amurpres posted the full text of respected Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on Dec. 30 last year to mark the 5th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important matters in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Finland
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The work, published on February 26, Juche 104 (2015), indicates the tasks and ways for covering the mountains of the country with green woods by conducting a vigorous forest restoration campaign involving the entire party, the whole army and all the people.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place in Helsinki on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Idea of Independent Reunification Hailed in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Idea of Independent Reunification Hailed in Nigeria
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies of Nigeria issued a joint statement on Jan. 1 in support of the part on national reunification of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address.
					 The statement said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un in his New Year address called for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification of Korea by united efforts of the whole nation this year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 Joint Statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 Declaration.
					
					 He said that positive measures should be taken to improve inter-Korean relations, avoid acute military confrontation and remove the danger of war between the north and the south.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to be well aware of the Korean nation's will for reunification and no longer cling to the scheme for whipping up national estrangement by inciting the anti-reunification forces in south Korea to confrontation and war with the fellow countrymen but make a courageous decision to roll back its anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK.
					
					 We fully support the idea of independent reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will register new successes in their struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Songun Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Songun Exploits Lauded by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Last year magazines and newspapers of different countries gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The December issue of China's Hong Kong magazine International Link carried articles titled "Five Years of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un" and "Mettle of Leader Kim Jong Un" illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The magazine praised the history of Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership, saying that the past five years since he assumed the KPA supreme commandership were the days when the world understood how extraordinary man he is.
					
					 The Dec. 22nd issue of Iran's newspaper Iran News and the Dec. 14th issue of the Congolese newspaper African Weekly carried article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un Seen by the World" and other articles illustrated with his photos.
					
					 The papers lauded the Songun exploits of Kim Jong Un who has reliably defended not only the security of the country and the people but also the regional peace and stability by consolidating the DPRK's military strength.
					
					 On Dec. 26, the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., of China's Hong Kong introduced in detail the world-startling achievements made in getting the KPA combat-ready and developing all spheres of social life of the DPRK under the guidance of Kim Jong Un. It aired that the world society would continue to view with attention what events the DPRK would register under his leadership in the future.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae parte con rumbo a Nicaragua
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae parte con rumbo a Nicaragua
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, salio hoy de esta capital para tomar parte en la ceremonia de investidura del presidente de la Republica de Nicaragua en calidad de enviado especial del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					Le despidieron Ri Su Yong, miembro del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, Ri Kil Song, viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre el Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, averiguo en el terreno la situacion del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae donde se crean innovaciones en la produccion inicial del Ano Nuevo.
					Recorriendo varios procesos, Choe indago la produccion de rieles pesados a ser enviados al campo de construccion de la ferrovia ancha Hyesan-Samjiyon y estimulo a los obreros del Complejo que registran un auge productivo.
					
					En la reunion de consulta convocada seguidamente, se dio enfasis en la importancia de la mision asumida por el Complejo en acondicionar mejor el distrito de Samjiyon y se debatio el problema de dar acicate a la produccion de rieles pesados mediante la movilizacion general de las organizaciones del partido y de entidades de masas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta la visita de Abe a Pearl Harbor
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta la visita de Abe a Pearl Harbor
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes el articulo de un comentarista que revelo el objetivo de la visita de Abe a Pearl Harbor.
					Del 26 al 27 de diciembre del ano expirado, Abe realizo una visita a Pearl Harbor de Hawai de Estados Unidos por primera vez como premier japones, comienza el comentarista y continua:
					
					Durante su visita, Abe recorrio el Cementerio Nacional del Pacifico y el hall memorial del buque de guerra Arizona, situados en la ciudad de Honolulu de Hawai, donde escenifico la farsa de "ofrendar flores" y guardar un momento de silencio. 
					
					Durante la "cumbre" y la entrevista conjunta de prensa y en su "declaracion" y otras ocasiones, el visitante habia expuesto la posicion de "recordar" a los norteamericanos caidos en la guerra y el deseo de que "Pearl Harbor se quede en la memoria como simbolo de reconciliacion". 
					
					Insistiendo en que "no debe ser repetido nunca mas el desastre de guerra", dijo que "se siente orgulloso en silencio de la trayectoria pacifista de Japon en mas de 70 anos despues de la guerra". 
					
					En la charla sostenida con Obama, subrayo la necesidad de ampliar la alianza Japon-EE.UU. y fortalecer la alianza militar tripartita con EE.UU. y Sudcorea para la paz y seguridad de la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					Aunque el dijo muchas cosas en varios lugares, sus palabras resultaron un "homenaje" superficial a las victimas del ataque a Pearl Harbor y no hubo ninguna frase que significara la disculpa o arrepentimiento de los crimenes del pasado. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, Abe visito a Pearl Harbor para vengarse de Obama por la verguenza y humillacion sufridas el ano pasado en Hiroshima. 
					
					Igualmente, esa visita suplicante, enganosa y belicista del jefe del militarismo japones persiguio el fin de reparar la alianza Japon-EE.UU., que se afloja bruscamente debido al cambio del inquilino de la Casa Blanca, y realizar a toda costa la anejada ilusion de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental" bajo el vistoso cartel de la "paz". 
					
					Aunque Abe adule mucho a su amo gringo abrigando muchas intenciones, no podra conseguir nada. 
					
					El mejor remedio para salvar a su pais en via de arruinamiento esta en pedir sinceras disculpas por los crimenes del pasado, indemnizarlos totalmente y renunciar para siempre la ambicion de reagresion. 
					
					La conducta belicosa de Abe tendente a realizar su ambicion de agredir nuevamente a Asia y la Peninsula Coreana con el apoyo de EE.UU. no dara otro resultado que el hundimiento de todo el archipielago japones.

articles.title: Demandan en Sur de Corea la dimision de Park Geun-hye y la no ubicacion de THAAD
articles.content:
Demandan en Sur de Corea la dimision de Park Geun-hye y la no ubicacion de THAAD
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el periodico online surcoreano Tongil News, tuvo lugar el 31 de diciembre del ano expirado en Seul el mitin de accion emergente para la dimision de Park Geun-hye y la cancelacion de la decision de emplazamiento de THAAD bajo coauspicios de la Accion Nacional para Impedir la Ubicacion de THAAD, el Comite de Songju para la Lucha contra la Ubicacion de THAAD, el Comite de Medidas Civiles de la Ciudad de Kimchon contra el Emplazamiento de THAAD y el Comite de Medidas Emergentes para la Defensa de la Tierra Sagrada de Songju de Wonbulgyo (secta del budismo) del Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion los oradores revelaron que al dia siguiente despues de ser rechazada la acusacion al presidente del grupo Lotte y publicada la decision de no detenerlo, fue determinado de repente el terreno para el emplazamiento de THAAD.
					
					Se puede conocer que el grupo Lotte es el corrupto relacionado con el "poder" si se observa el proceso de negociaciones entre Lotte y el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional, condenaron.
					
					Prosiguieron que hubo evidentemente la intervencion de la industria belica detras del "poder" de Park Geun-hye que impulsa con urgencia el despliegue de THAAD que no tiene nada que ver con la seguridad social y amenaza el derecho a la vida del pueblo.
					
					Demandaron a los politicos declarar de inmediato la posicion de cancelar totalmente el plan de ubicar ese armamento.
